thread.title: Two men to be charged with murder of missing man Bradley Breward
thread.title_full: Two men to be charged with murder of missing man Bradley Breward

title: Two men to be charged with murder of missing man Bradley Breward
text:
Bradley Breward: Two facing murder charges over missing Launceston man Posted February 03, 2017 16:14:56 Map: South Launceston 7249 
Two Launceston men are facing murder charges over the disappearance of Bradley Wade Breward. 
Mr Breward, 22, of the Launceston suburb of Mowbray, had not been seen since New Year's Eve and was formally reported missing on January 17. 
Last week information from his family and friends led police to search a house in the Launceston suburb of Newnham. 
On Friday afternoon police said a 25-year-old South Launceston man and a 41-year-old West Launceston man were to be charged with his murder. 
The two men were arrested on Thursday and were remanded in custody overnight. 
The pair are due to appear in an after-hours sitting of the Launceston Magistrates Court later this evening.
